mention.text: maybe the greatest natural occurrence one can witness
a dormant volcano that makes up a large piece of the island of Hawaii. ; Historic events
its 150-mile-wide path across Hawaii , Baja California , Mexico City and four Central American capital cities
a California Institute of Technology astronomer who will be at one of the observatories atop Mauna Kea , a dormant volcano that makes up a large piece of the island of Hawaii. ; Historic events
the first confirmation of Albert Einstein 's prediction
